get.summary: Get all titles for a request
get.description: Retrieves all titles/collaterals associated with the specified request.
Retrieves a specific title/collateral by its ID for the specified request.

put.description: Updates an existing request in the system.

get.description: Retrieves a specific request by its unique identifier.

delete.description: Deletes a request by its ID.

post.description: Submits a request for processing.

get.description: Retrieves all requests from the system with pagination support.

post.description: Creates a new request in the system.
Creates a draft request that can be completed later.

patch.description: Updates an existing comment on the specified request.

delete.summary: Remove a comment from a request
delete.description: Removes an existing comment from the specified request.

get.description: Retrieves a specific comment by its ID.

get.summary: Get all comments for a request
get.description: Retrieves all comments associated with the specified request.

post.summary: Add a comment to a request
post.description: Adds a new comment to the specified request.

get.description: Retrieves all roles from the system. This endpoint returns a list of roles with their details.

post.description: Create new role.

get.description: Get role by ID

delete.description: Deletes a role by its ID. If the role does not exist, a 404 Not Found error is returned.

get.description: Retrieves all permissions from the system. This endpoint returns a list of permissions with their details.

post.description: Create new permission.

get.description: Get permission by ID

delete.description: Deletes a permission by its ID. If the permission does not exist, a 404 Not Found error is returned.

patch.description: Updates the profile information of the currently authenticated user

post.description: Register a new user account.
Register a new client.

get.description: Returns the current user's profile including roles and permissions

patch.description: Marks a specific notification as read
Marks all notifications for a user as read

get.description: Retrieves the current workflow status for a request
Retrieves notifications for a specific user
Retrieves unread notifications for a specific user

post.description: Starts a new workflow for a request.

get.description: Retrieves all workflow tasks with pagination support.

patch.summary: Set an active request ID of the collateral
patch.description: Set an active request ID of the collateral.
Updates an existing collateral in the system. The collateral details are provided in the request body.

get.description: Get collateral by ID

delete.description: Deletes a collateral by its ID. If the collateral does not exist, a 404 Not Found error is returned.

get.description: Retrieves all collaterals from the system. This endpoint returns a list of collaterals with their details.

post.description: Creates a new collateral in the system. The collateral details are provided in the collateral body.

get.description: Retrieve all quotation requests with pagination.

post.description: Create a new Request for Quotation (RFQ) for external appraisal assignments.

get.description: Retrieve a specific quotation request by its ID.

put.description: Update final values for a pricing analysis.

get.description: Get a pricing analysis by ID with all approaches.

put.description: Updates the value, value per unit, and/or unit type of an existing method.
Updates an existing final value including optional land area and building cost calculations.
Updates subject values, comparable values, weight, or adjustment percentage for a factor score.

delete.description: Removes a factor score from a pricing calculation and resequences remaining scores.

put.description: Updates the weight and/or display sequence of a comparable link.
Updates all calculation fields including pricing, time adjustments, area adjustments, and factor adjustments.

delete.description: Removes a pricing calculation from a pricing method.

put.description: Updates the value and/or weight of an existing approach.

delete.description: Removes a market comparable link and its associated calculation from a pricing method.

post.description: Change pricing analysis status from Draft to InProgress.

post.summary: Set final value for pricing method
post.description: Creates or updates the final value for a specific pricing method. Supports optional land area and building cost calculations.
Selects a method as the primary method, setting all other methods in the same approach as Alternative.

put.description: Saves Step 1 (factor selection) and Step 2 (factor scoring) in a single transaction

post.description: Recalculates the total factor difference percentage by summing all factor score adjustments.
Links a market comparable to a pricing method and creates an associated calculation.

get.summary: Get pricing analysis by property group
get.description: Get pricing analysis for a specific property group.

post.description: Create a new pricing analysis for a property group.

get.summary: Get comparative factors for a pricing method
get.description: Returns Step 1 factor selections, Step 2 factor scores, and calculations

post.description: Complete pricing analysis and set final values (changes status to Completed).
Adds a new method (WQS, SaleGrid, DirectComparison, etc.) to an approach.

post.summary: Add factor score to pricing calculation
post.description: Adds a new factor score to a WQS/SaleGrid pricing calculation for factor-level comparison.
Creates a new pricing calculation for a market comparable within a pricing method.
Adds a new approach (Market, Cost, or Income) to a pricing analysis.

put.description: Update an existing market comparable template details.

get.summary: Get market comparable template by ID
get.description: Retrieve a specific market comparable template with all its factors.

delete.description: Soft delete (deactivate) a market comparable template.
Remove a comparison factor from a market comparable template.

get.description: Retrieve all market comparable templates with optional filtering by property type and active status.

post.description: Create a new market comparable template for a property type.
Link an existing factor to a market comparable template.

put.summary: Set factor data for market comparable
put.description: Sets or updates multiple factor values for a market comparable.

delete.description: Removes an image from a market comparable record.

get.description: Retrieves all market comparable records with pagination support.

post.description: Create a new market comparable record for property valuation reference.

get.description: Retrieves a market comparable with full details including factor data and images.

post.description: Links a document (uploaded via Document API) as an image to a market comparable record.

put.description: Updates an existing market comparable factor. Note: FactorCode and DataType are immutable and cannot be changed.

delete.description: Soft deletes a market comparable factor by setting IsActive to false.

get.description: Retrieves all market comparable factors. Set activeOnly=false to include inactive factors.

post.description: Creates a new market comparable factor with field metadata. Valid DataType values: Text, Numeric, Dropdown, Checkbox, Date, Radio. Dropdown and Radio types require ParameterGroup.

patch.description: Reject a pending fee item with a reason.

post.description: Record a payment against an appraisal fee.

get.description: Get all fees and their items for an appraisal.

post.description: Add an individual fee item (e.g. Travel Fee, Urgent Fee) to an existing appraisal fee.

put.description: Updates an existing document type

delete.description: Soft deletes (deactivates) a document type

put.description: Updates an existing document requirement's isRequired, isActive, and notes fields

delete.description: Soft deletes (deactivates) a document requirement

get.description: Returns all document types for admin configuration

post.description: Creates a new document type for use in document requirements

get.description: Returns all document requirements. Use collateralTypeCode=APP for application-level, or L/B/U/VEH/etc. for collateral-specific

post.description: Creates a new document requirement linking a document type to a collateral type. Use null for CollateralTypeCode for application-level requirements.

get.summary: Get document checklist for specified collateral types
get.description: Returns application-level documents and collateral-specific documents grouped by type

put.description: Updates template name, description, and active status

get.summary: Get a comparative analysis template by ID
get.description: Returns template details with all factors

delete.description: Soft deletes a template by deactivating it

delete.summary: Remove a factor from a template
delete.description: Removes a market comparable factor from the template

get.description: Returns all templates, optionally filtered to only active ones

post.description: Creates a new template for comparative analysis factors based on property type

post.summary: Add a factor to a template
post.description: Adds a market comparable factor to the template

get.description: Retrieves all committees with pagination support.

post.description: Create a new committee for appraisal approval workflows.

patch.description: Reject an appraisal assignment with a reason.

get.description: Get all assignments for an appraisal.

post.description: Assign an appraisal to an internal user or external company.

patch.description: Cancel an appraisal assignment with a reason.

put.description: Update the detail of a vessel property.

get.description: Retrieves a vessel property with its detail by property ID.

put.description: Update the detail of a vehicle property.

get.description: Retrieves a vehicle property with its detail by property ID.

put.description: Update an existing property group.

get.description: Get a specific property group with all its properties.

delete.description: Delete a property group from an appraisal.

put.description: Updates an existing photo topic's name, sort order, and display columns.

delete.description: Deletes a photo topic. Fails if the topic still has photos assigned.

put.description: Update the detail of a machinery property.

get.description: Retrieves a machinery property with its detail by property ID.

put.description: Update the detail of a land property.

get.description: Retrieves a land property with its detail by property ID.

put.summary: Update land and building property detail
put.description: Update the detail of a land and building property.

get.summary: Get land and building property detail
get.description: Retrieves a land and building property with its detail by property ID.

put.description: Updates category, caption, GPS coordinates, and captured date for a gallery photo.

delete.description: Removes a photo from the appraisal gallery and deletes any property photo mappings linked to it.

put.description: Update the detail of a condo property.

get.description: Retrieves a condo property with its detail by property ID.

put.description: Update the detail of a building property.

get.description: Retrieves a building property with its detail by property ID.

put.description: Removes the thumbnail designation from the specified photo mapping.

post.description: Removes a gallery photo from the appraisal report.

delete.description: Removes a photo-to-property mapping.

put.description: Sets the specified photo mapping as the thumbnail for its property. Automatically unsets any existing thumbnail.
Reorder properties within a group by providing the full ordered list of property IDs.

delete.description: Remove a property from a property group.

put.description: Move a property from its current group to a different group at an optional position.

post.description: Marks a gallery photo to be included in the appraisal report under the specified section.
Creates a mapping between a gallery photo and a specific property detail section.

get.description: Get all property groups for an appraisal.

post.description: Create a new property group within an appraisal.

get.description: Returns all photo topics for the appraisal with their assigned photos, ordered by sort order.

post.description: Creates a new photo topic for organizing gallery photos in the appraisal.

get.summary: Get all photos in appraisal gallery
get.description: Returns all photos for the specified appraisal, ordered by photo number.

post.description: Uploads a photo reference to the appraisal gallery. Document must be uploaded first via Document API.

get.description: Retrieves all appraisals with pagination and optional filtering by status, priority, appraisal type, and assignee.

post.description: Create a new appraisal for a request.

get.description: Retrieves a single appraisal by its ID.

post.description: Creates a new vessel property with its appraisal detail for an appraisal.
Creates a new vehicle property with its appraisal detail for an appraisal.
Creates a new machinery property with its appraisal detail for an appraisal.
Creates a new land property with its appraisal detail for an appraisal.

post.summary: Create a land and building property
post.description: Creates a new land and building property with its appraisal detail for an appraisal.
Creates a new condo property with its appraisal detail for an appraisal.
Creates a new building property with its appraisal detail for an appraisal.

put.description: Assigns a gallery photo to a topic, or unassigns it by passing null.

post.description: Add a property to a property group.

patch.description: Reschedule an appointment to a new date/time.

get.description: Get all appointments for an appraisal.

post.description: Create a new property survey appointment for an assignment.

patch.description: Cancel an appointment with an optional reason.

post.description: Publishes a TaskCompleted event for testing notifications
Publishes a TaskAssigned event for testing notifications
Publishes a TransitionCompleted event for testing notifications
